content: “Evaluation of the Antidiarrhoeal Activity of Aqueous Stem Bark Extract of Terminalia Catappa in Castor Oil-Induced Diarrhoeal Albino Rats”. Fountain Journal of Natural and Applied Sciences 11, no. 2 (December 30, 2022). Accessed December 30, 2025. https://fountainjournals.com/index.php/FUJNAS/article/view/413.
